reviewText:
My grandson loves watching the Hulk on TV but finds it hard to find on local TV channels since it is an old series.  He really did enjoy having a video of the Hulk
of his own.

The Incredible Hulk aired on UPN Kids from September 1996 until September of 1999.  The show was well animated and humerous, another marvelous animated series from Marvel, no pun intended.  The only thing that confuses me is why Fox Kids video released it when it never aired on Fox Kids?  It aired on UPN Kids.
